title: Activision Blizzard Employees Initiate Strike - Kinda Funny Games Daily 12.09.21
description:
Janet and Tim break down the last minute Game Awards updates, the strike against Activision, Halo's new trademarks, and more!

Time Stamps -
00:00:00 - Start
00:04:30 - Housekeeping
PSILY XOXO is up right now and it’s our breakdown of Project Spartacus. That’s up right now on Youtube.com/Kindafunnygames and podcast services around the globe.
We’re watching along with The Game Awards! That’s happening TOMORROW, Thursday evening over on Twitch.tv/kindafunnygames.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Pranksy, Black Jack, & Greg Miller Returns to Content Next Month, Nick Should Quit Now!
The Roper Report  -
00:05:50 - Activision Blizzard Staff Announce Start of New Strike Action - Matt Purslow @ IGN
00:12:12 - Halo: The Endless trademark filed by Microsoft - Hirun (here-on) Cryer
00:20:50 - Halo Infinite wins The Game Awards 2021 public vote before it’s even out
00:26:35 - NES and SNES creator Masayuki Uemura dies at 78
00:39:35 - Xbox's Winter Game Fest offers 36 demos of upcoming indie games
00:37:00 - Ad
00:47:20 - Out today
00:50:30 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Tim and Jared Petty
itunes:author: Kinda Funny
